description: This file is an HTML source file for a web-based database visualization tool. It defines the structure, styles, and client-side scripting for browsing databases, tables, and viewing their data interactively.
external_files: fetch API calls to endpoints like /api/databases, /api/{db}/tables, /api/{db}/tables/{tableName}/data

methods.name: loadDatabases()
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: toggleDatabase(db)
methods.description: Expands or collapses database entries in the sidebar.

methods.name: loadTables(db)
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData(db, tableName)
methods.description: Loads and displays data for the selected table.

methods.name: renderCell(value)
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling different data types.

methods.name: expandCell(element)
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for wide or complex data.
